value.stringValue: Add to weekly WTB email list; matches to be added directly to the opportunity
Post WTB on Iron Connect. If it is an ON ROAD truck, or a CRANE, please DO NOT post on IronConnect,close task as not required. Matching units to be added to opp.
Post WTB on MT (crane trader or truck trader as needed), Mascus, Machinio, Rock & Dirt, Construction Equipment Guide, and Used Equipment Guide. Matches to be added to opp.
Search CL, FB, auctions for WTB units; add auction units to live auction tab & other units to SF/opp
Send WTB email with parameters to equipment sellers, end users, dealers, and finance companies. Responses will be sent to you to add to original opp as multiple units.
